DOC.brief_summary: Most premature baby difficulty breathe birth need help ( call resuscitation ) . The treatment gently inflate lung resuscitation device facemask . The device commonly use T-Piece infant resuscitator ( call T-Piece ) use The Royal Alexandra Hospital round world . To gentle inflate infant lung clinical team put face mask around baby 's mouth nose . The clinical team try achieve good seal face mask . A problem mask ventilation air escape mask face ( call mask leak ) . Currently , two different type facemasks ( `` Laerdal mask '' `` Fisher & Paykel mask '' ) routinely use delivery room The Royal Alexandra Hospital . The purpose study find one facemask leak less face mask .
DOC.brief_title: Mask Ventilation With Different Face Masks During Neonatal Resuscitation
DOC.detailed_description: We use Laerdal round mask ( Laerdal , Stavanger , Norway ) compare Fisher & Paykel ( FP ) ( Fisher & Paykel Healthcare , Auckland , New Zealand ) 'round ' neonatal resuscitation mask . The two point top hold Laerdal 'round ' mask rim hold Fisher & Paykel mask . A Respiratory Function Monitor place face mask ventilation device . It use small ( dead space 1 mL ) flow sensor measure gas flow face mask . This signal automatically integrated provide inspire expired tidal volume . The difference equal leak face mask . It also calculate respiratory rate minute ventilation , measure spontaneous inspiration ventilation pressure . The signal airway flow , tidal volume , airway pressure , inspire oxygen concentration , temperature , blood pressure , oxygen saturation , heart rate digitise record 200Hz use Spectra physiological record program ( customised neonatal respiratory physiology program ) . We compare % mask leak within two face mask .
